name: Generic Space Shooter
description: Welcome to an epic world of endless carnage, where you battle alien foes at lightning fast speeds, and engage in mind meltingly epic boss battles. Immerse yourself in a beautifully hand crafted world, with visually stunning top down graphics and unlimited action packed levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Basic motherboard graphics card Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Basic motherboard sound card Additional Notes: These minimum requirements are not 100% accurate. The game should run on most machines (even fairly older ones).

reviews.review_text: Fun and quick game, exactly as the name suggest but it has enough if things that make it stand out, plenty of unlocks and plenty of ways to challenge you. The control is better suited for controllers than keyboards, In fact, I can't imagine trying to play this game without a controller.
Don't bother if you're into mouse+keyboard. The controls are just absolute crap. Instead of WSAD movement, you move with right mouse button and shoot with left.
